a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Government spending vs GDP per capita, 2013
Total government expenditure including interest payments on debt. GDP per capita is adjusted for price
differences between countries and adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank; IMF Fiscal Affairs Departmental Data, based on Mauro et al. (2015)
